pageContent.title: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:14pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px -5px 10px 5px; padding:5px 0 5px 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Meeting with Dr. Cardonza – Exploring Areas of Value Creation</Introtext>
pageContent.title2: Meeting with Dr. Cardonza – Exploring Areas of Value Creation
pageContent.instructions: <welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:11pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:bold; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">Which question will you ask Dr. Cardonza to move the conversation forward?</welcomeText>

choice.choiceText: A. What role does staying abreast of medical advances play in your goal of achieving patient treatment goals and being one of the top hospitals for cardiac care?
B. Ensuring that you achieve high levels of patient satisfaction can be very hard. What challenges do you foresee?
C. Given the strategies you’ve just described, what barriers do you face in achieving the treatment goals you’re working toward?
D. Who could I talk to about educational events your department may want to consider attending?
